languages.text: "Однажды. Леди Теодора отыскала при его помощи неких соглядатаев, проникших на борт... и служивших, судя по всему, Лорд-инквизитору Калькасару".
"Once. Lady Theodora made use of his services to expose spies on board... who apparently had been in the employ of Lord Inquisitor Calcazar."
languages.original_text: "Однажды. Леди Теодора отыскала при его помощи неких соглядатаев, проникших на борт... и служивших, судя по всему, Лорд-инквизитору Калькасару".

traits.locale_text: "Once. Lady Theodora made use of his services to expose spies on board... who apparently had been in the employ of Lord Inquisitor Calcazar."
"Once. Lady Theodora made use of his services to expose spies on board... who apparently had been in the employ of Lord Inquisitor Calcazar."

"Once. Lady Theodora made use of his services to expose spies on board... who apparently had been in the employ of Lord Inquisitor Calcazar."
"Once. Lady Theodora made use of his services to expose spies on board... who apparently had been in the employ of Lord Inquisitor Calcazar."

languages.text: «Una vez. Lady Theodora usó sus servicios para revelar a los espías a bordo... que, al parecer, estaban a las órdenes del Lord Inquisidor Calcazar».
languages.original_text: "Once. Lady Theodora made use of his services to expose spies on board... who apparently had been in the employ of Lord Inquisitor Calcazar."

traits.locale_text: «Una vez. Lady Theodora usó sus servicios para revelar a los espías a bordo... que, al parecer, estaban a las órdenes del Lord Inquisidor Calcazar».

languages.text: 「一度だけ。シオドーラ様は船内のスパイを炙り出そうと、彼に儀式を頼みました…スパイはカルカサル・ロード・インクィジターに雇われていたことが判明しました」
languages.original_text: "Once. Lady Theodora made use of his services to expose spies on board... who apparently had been in the employ of Lord Inquisitor Calcazar."

traits.locale_text: 「一度だけ。シオドーラ様は船内のスパイを炙り出そうと、彼に儀式を頼みました…スパイはカルカサル・ロード・インクィジターに雇われていたことが判明しました」

languages.text: “有那么一次。那个时候，西奥多拉夫人打算利用他的力量找到船上的间谍……很显然，她要找的是大审判官卡尔卡扎的手下。”
languages.original_text: "Once. Lady Theodora made use of his services to expose spies on board... who apparently had been in the employ of Lord Inquisitor Calcazar."

traits.locale_text: “有那么一次。那个时候，西奥多拉夫人打算利用他的力量找到船上的间谍……很显然，她要找的是大审判官卡尔卡扎的手下。”

languages.text: "Einmal. Lady Theodora hat seine Dienste genutzt, um Spione an Bord zu enttarnen ... die offenbar in Diensten von Großinquisitor Calcazar gestanden hatten."
languages.original_text: "Once. Lady Theodora made use of his services to expose spies on board... who apparently had been in the employ of Lord Inquisitor Calcazar."

traits.locale_text: "Einmal. Lady Theodora hat seine Dienste genutzt, um Spione an Bord zu enttarnen ... die offenbar in Diensten von Großinquisitor Calcazar gestanden hatten."

languages.text: « Une fois. Dame Théodora a fait appel à lui pour démasquer des espions infiltrés à son bord... des espions dont il est apparu qu'ils travaillaient pour le seigneur inquisiteur Calcazar. »
languages.original_text: "Once. Lady Theodora made use of his services to expose spies on board... who apparently had been in the employ of Lord Inquisitor Calcazar."

traits.locale_text: « Une fois. Dame Théodora a fait appel à lui pour démasquer des espions infiltrés à son bord... des espions dont il est apparu qu'ils travaillaient pour le seigneur inquisiteur Calcazar. »

languages.text: "Yalnızca bir kez. Leydi Theodora, güvertedeki casusları açığa çıkarmak için hizmetlerinden faydalandı ve... Casusların Lord Engizisyoncu Calcazar'ın emrinde çalıştıkları açığa çıktı."
languages.original_text: "Once. Lady Theodora made use of his services to expose spies on board... who apparently had been in the employ of Lord Inquisitor Calcazar."
